chiefComplaint: What brings you in today related to your cough?
HPI: When did the cough start?
Is it a dry cough or are you coughing up phlegm?
Do you have any fever or chills?
Have you had any shortness of breath or chest pain?
Are there any triggers that make the cough worse?
PMH: Have you had similar symptoms in the past?
Do you have a history of asthma or lung disease?
Medications: Are you currently taking any medications for cough or allergies?
SH: Do you smoke or are you exposed to secondhand smoke?
Do you work in an environment with dust or chemicals?
FH: Is there any family history of asthma, allergies, or respiratory conditions?

chiefComplaint: What symptoms are you experiencing along with the fever?
HPI: When did the fever start?
What is the highest temperature youâ€™ve recorded?
Is the fever constant or does it come and go?
Do you have any chills, body aches, or sweating?
Have you traveled recently or been in contact with anyone sick?
PMH: Do you have any chronic illnesses or recurring infections?
Medications: Have you taken any fever-reducing medications?
SH: Do you live or work in close contact with others?
Have you been exposed to someone with a recent illness?
FH: Is there any family history of frequent fevers or immune disorders?

chiefComplaint: What brings you in today regarding your back pain?
HPI: When did the pain start?
Can you describe the location and type of pain (sharp, dull, radiating)?
Is it constant or does it come and go?
What activities or positions worsen or relieve the pain?
Did you experience any recent injury, fall, or strain?
PMH: Do you have any history of back problems or spinal conditions?
Have you had any surgeries or accidents in the past?
Medications: Are you taking any pain relief or anti-inflammatory medications?
SH: What is your occupation and do you engage in heavy lifting or sitting long hours?
Do you exercise or stretch regularly?
FH: Is there a family history of arthritis, disc problems, or spine issues?

chiefComplaint: What concerns you most about the rash?
HPI: When did the rash start?
Where is the rash located and how has it changed over time?
Is it itchy, painful, or blistering?
Have you used any new soaps, lotions, or medications recently?
Did you eat anything unusual or come into contact with plants or animals?
PMH: Do you have a history of allergies, eczema, or skin conditions?
Medications: Are you using any topical creams or medications on the rash?
SH: Do you have any pets, or have you been outdoors recently?
Are you in contact with others who have skin issues?
FH: Is there any family history of skin conditions or allergies?

chiefComplaint: What happened that led to the injury?
HPI: When did the injury occur?
What part of your body is affected?
Was there any swelling, bruising, or inability to move the joint?
Were you able to walk or use the affected limb immediately after?
Did you apply any first aid or treatment at home?
PMH: Do you have a history of joint injuries or bone issues?
Do you have any bleeding or clotting disorders?
Medications: Are you currently taking any blood thinners or pain relievers?
SH: Do you play any sports or engage in physical activity regularly?
Did the injury happen at work or during recreation?
FH: Is there any family history of joint instability or bone disorders?

chiefComplaint: What brings you in today regarding your headache?
HPI: When did the headache start?
Where is the pain located (front, back, one side)?
Is it a sharp, throbbing, or dull pain?
How long does it last and how often does it occur?
Are there any triggers like light, sound, stress, or food?
Have you experienced any nausea, vision changes, or aura?
PMH: Do you have a history of migraines or frequent headaches?
Do you have any neurological or chronic conditions?
Medications: Are you taking any pain medications or migraine treatments?
SH: How is your sleep, diet, and stress level?
Do you consume caffeine or alcohol regularly?
FH: Is there any family history of migraines or neurological disorders?

chiefComplaint: What brings you in today regarding feeling tired or fatigued?
HPI: When did you start feeling fatigued?
Is it constant or does it come and go?
Does anything make it better or worse (sleep, food, activity)?
Are you having difficulty concentrating or staying awake?
Have you had any recent illness, stress, or lifestyle change?
PMH: Do you have a history of thyroid problems, anemia, or depression?
Any past episodes of prolonged fatigue?
Medications: Are you currently on any medications that might cause drowsiness?
SH: How many hours of sleep do you get?
What is your typical diet and activity level?
Are you experiencing stress at work or home?
FH: Is there a family history of thyroid disorders, sleep disorders, or chronic fatigue?
